name: demo-frameworks
description: This repository serves as a parent project for multiple demo projects, each individually version-controlled. This setup allows easy management and collaboration on multiple projects within a single repository using Git submodules.

scripts.setup: npm run kill && npm run setup:angular && npm run setup:react && npm run setup:solid && npm run setup:svelte && npm run setup:vue
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run kill" "npm run start:angular" "npm run start:react" "npm run start:solid" "npm run start:svelte" "npm run start:vue"
scripts.loadData: concurrently "npm run loadData:angular" "npm run loadData:react" "npm run loadData:solid" "npm run loadData:svelte" "npm run loadData:vue"
scripts.clearData: concurrently "npm run clearData:angular" "npm run clearData:react" "npm run clearData:solid" "npm run clearData:svelte" "npm run clearData:vue"
scripts.kill: concurrently "npx kill-port 3001" "npx kill-port 3002" "npx kill-port 3003" "npx kill-port 3004" "npx kill-port 3005"
